https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3Y0jXta38mWmnYENrzDlHGaFwUi.jpg The film tells a warm and realistic story, thinking and facing the ultimate problem that every ordinary person will face-imagining that death may come at any time, the only thing we have to do is love and cherish. A Little Red Flower
